text-node.description: Prepares the Cart sections for Checkout pages.
Gets the shipping methods and sets the default shipping method to Basket.
Sets the shipping method and returns the result as JSON response.
Add product to mini cart. Renders a new mini cart and not a full cart.

Condition for checking whether it is referred friend url. If yes then set all the details of referrer in session parameters. These parameters will be used on confirmation for calling refer a friend API.
This branch is used to revalidate existing payment instruments in later checkout steps.
Checks if the basket has already a shipping address set and creates one, if not.
Renders the Recommendation sections for Checkout pages.
Verify if basket contain the same product
Verify if Shipping and Billing Address Equivalent
Display "Cart is empty" page
Modify cart calculation logic. Need to multiply shipping method cost by product quantity
Do no make an auth code validator service call if the campaign has an Enter Promo Code on Cart Page
Call basic calculation pipeline

pipelet-node.custom-name: Modify shipping cost, multiplying it by product quantity

text-node.description: Prepares the PersonInformation sections(forms).
Prepares the Recomendation form.
Attempts to update the basket from the attributes of the personinf form.
Checks if the basket has already a payment insrument set and update form, if yes.
Attempts to update the basket billing address with the attributes of the address form.
Attempts to update the basket shipping address with the attributes of the address form.
Attempts to update the basket email address with the attributes of the contactInf form.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group
Bind stateCode to sub form group

pipelet-node.description: Need to use this pipelet instead of UpdateObjectFromForm since the latter one doesn't support recursive lists yet.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Copy the email address to the basket,eveningphone to billing address,daytimephone to shipping

text-node.description: skip the payment handling if the whole payment was made using gift cert

pipelet-node.custom-name: Invalidate Address1 field for billing info
Invalidate Address1 field for shipping info
